page.title: 19LAPWORTH CLUBS
page.content:
There are many varied clubs in the village:_ CRICKET CLUB.....HOCKEY CLUB..... FISHING.....GUN CLUB.....HORSE SHOW BADMINTON.....HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY LOCAL HISTORY GROUP.....WINE CIRCLE LAPWORTH PLAYERS.....LAPWORTH W I .. KINGSWOOD W I .....BRITISH LEGION... OLD PEOPLES ASSOCIATION.............
For children:_ PRE SCHOOL PLAYGROUP.....MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP.....BROWNIES.....GUIDES.....CUBS .....SCOUTS...........................
and don't forget the mobile library...baby clinic..........e t c..
